speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: SCENE III. Another room in the castle.

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: Enter KING CLAUDIUS, attended

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: I have sent to seek him, and to find the body.

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: How dangerous is it that this man goes loose!

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Yet must not we put the strong law on him:

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: He's loved of the distracted multitude,

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Who like not in their judgment, but their eyes;

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: And where tis so, the offender's scourge is weigh'd,

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: But never the offence. To bear all smooth and even,

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: This sudden sending him away must seem

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Deliberate pause: diseases desperate grown

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: By desperate appliance are relieved,

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Or not at all.

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Enter ROSENCRANTZ

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: How now! what hath befall'n?

speaker: ROSENCRANTZ
text_entry: Where the dead body is bestow'd, my lord,

speaker: ROSENCRANTZ
text_entry: We cannot get from him.

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: But where is he?

speaker: ROSENCRANTZ
text_entry: Without, my lord; guarded, to know your pleasure.

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Bring him before us.

speaker: ROSENCRANTZ
text_entry: Ho, Guildenstern! bring in my lord.

speaker: ROSENCRANTZ
text_entry: Enter HAMLET and GUILDENSTERN

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Now, Hamlet, where's Polonius?

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: At supper.

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: At supper! where?

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: Not where he eats, but where he is eaten: a certain

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: convocation of politic worms are e'en at him. Your

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: worm is your only emperor for diet: we fat all

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: creatures else to fat us, and we fat ourselves for

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: maggots: your fat king and your lean beggar is but

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: variable service, two dishes, but to one table:

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: that's the end.

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Alas, alas!

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: A man may fish with the worm that hath eat of a

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: king, and cat of the fish that hath fed of that worm.

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: What dost you mean by this?

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: Nothing but to show you how a king may go a

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: progress through the guts of a beggar.

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Where is Polonius?

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: In heaven; send hither to see: if your messenger

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: find him not there, seek him i' the other place

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: yourself. But indeed, if you find him not within

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: this month, you shall nose him as you go up the

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: stairs into the lobby.

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Go seek him there.

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: To some Attendants

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: He will stay till ye come.

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: Exeunt Attendants

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Hamlet, this deed, for thine especial safety,--

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Which we do tender, as we dearly grieve

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: For that which thou hast done,--must send thee hence

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: With fiery quickness: therefore prepare thyself;

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: The bark is ready, and the wind at help,

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: The associates tend, and every thing is bent

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: For England.

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: For England!

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Ay, Hamlet.

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: Good.

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: So is it, if thou knew'st our purposes.

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: I see a cherub that sees them. But, come; for

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: England! Farewell, dear mother.

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Thy loving father, Hamlet.

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: My mother: father and mother is man and wife; man

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: and wife is one flesh; and so, my mother. Come, for England!

speaker: HAMLET
text_entry: Exit

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Follow him at foot; tempt him with speed aboard;

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Delay it not; I'll have him hence to-night:

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Away! for every thing is seal'd and done

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: That else leans on the affair: pray you, make haste.

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Exeunt ROSENCRANTZ and GUILDENSTERN

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: And, England, if my love thou hold'st at aught--

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: As my great power thereof may give thee sense,

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Since yet thy cicatrice looks raw and red

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: After the Danish sword, and thy free awe

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Pays homage to us--thou mayst not coldly set

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Our sovereign process; which imports at full,

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: By letters congruing to that effect,

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: The present death of Hamlet. Do it, England;

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: For like the hectic in my blood he rages,

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: And thou must cure me: till I know 'tis done,

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Howe'er my haps, my joys were ne'er begun.

speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
text_entry: Exit
